cards.title: Certificate in Front-End Web Development British Columbia Institute of Technology
cards.content: A Certificate in Front-End Web Development provided me with the skills to create visually appealing and interactive websites. The program covers essential web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design, ensuring I can build user-friendly interfaces. Through hands-on projects and practical exercises, graduates gain the ability to develop and maintain modern web applications. This certification prepares individuals for roles as front-end developers, web designers, and UI/UX specialists in the tech industry.

cards.title: Diploma in Computer Information Systems University of the Fraser Valley
cards.content: A Computer Information Systems diploma equipped me with essential skills in information technology, database management, and software development. The program focuses on practical applications and problem-solving in various business environments, preparing graduates for diverse roles in the IT sector. Students gain hands-on experience through labs and projects, ensuring they are well-prepared for the demands of the tech industry. With a curriculum that keeps pace with technological advancements, graduates are ready to tackle the evolving challenges of the IT world.
